# Phaethon Dynasty Lore Summary
[bold][color=#636B2F]The Phaethon Dynasty[/bold][/color] is a defiant imperial state born from the ruins of history’s most ruthless powers. Once seperatist states that arose from the [color=yellow][bold]First and Last Corporate War[/color][/bold] fell to Trans-Solarian Federation occupation at the edge of inhabited systems. [bold][color=#636B2F]The Phaethon Dynasty[/bold][/color] became a crucible of survival, unity, and technological advancement. Here, a populace left scarred by foreign rule—composed of corporate war survivors and [bold]Syndicate[/bold] remnants—built a new empire from the ashes of old. It became a dynasty of the discarded—fiercely independent and violently opposed to the oppresive regime of the [bold][color=cyan]Trans-Solarian Federation (TSF)[/bold]
Emerging from the wreckage of the [color=yellow][bold]First and Last Corporate War[/color][/bold], [bold][color=#636B2F]The Phaethon Dynasty[/bold][/color] holds deep ideological scars. Its people are victims of war and betrayal. Many, the children of [bold][color=#8B0000]Syndicate[/bold][/color] remnants who once served shadowy economic overlords, now pledge allegiance to [bold][color=#636B2F]The Phaethon Dynasty[/bold][/color]; the decendents of the last [bold][color=#8B0000]Syndicate[/bold][/color] commanders. They are united by a shared hatred of foreign states and a vision of an isolationist empire. The dynasty is not perfect; it is torn between old world [bold][color=#8B0000]Syndicate[/bold][/color] ideology and new idealists, funded by black markets, and surviving on an industry of salvaged technology. Though small, its industrial and technological, and military complex rivals that of much larger enemy forces. Its culture of asymmetrical warfare and geographical advantages make it nearly impossible to crush.
Guerrilla strikes, AI corruption, propaganda floods, and sabotage operations leave the TSF scrambling to take control of [bold]The Colossus Sector[/bold]. Their tactics are as much ideological as they are military. With neural leaks, anti-propaganda broadcasts, and liberated mythologies, [bold][color=#636B2F]The Phaethon Dynasty[/bold][/color] spreads rebellion in the Federation like a virus. Their space stations, scattered across the Colossus, remain off every map.
